the accommodation bursary scheme will be launched formally at the House of Lords on October7 by Baroness Susan Greenfield , a professor in the pharmacology department of Oxford University .「独立援助基金会」房租助学金计画将由牛津大学的药理学教授，男爵夫人苏珊˙蓝菲在10月7日于上议院正式提出。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 17th cent. (in sense 2): from medieval Latin bursaria, from bursa 'bag, purse' (see bursa)

entry.def: A bursary is a sum of money which is given to someone to allow them to study in a college or university.

means.word_mean: 1. the treasury of a public institution or religious order
